W h a t space w i l l space b e space c o m e space i n space t h e space p l a c e space o f space q u e s t i o n space m a r k space left parenthesis ? right parenthesis space i n space t h e space f o l l o w i n g space q u e s t i o n s space $ $ backslash f r a c space left curly bracket space left curly bracket space 7 space right curly bracket hat left curly bracket space 6 plus 3 plus 4 plus 15 space right curly bracket space right curly bracket left curly bracket space left curly bracket space 7 space right curly bracket hat left curly bracket space 8 space right curly bracket space right curly bracket space equals left curly bracket space 7 space right curly bracket hat left curly bracket space 2 ? space right curly bracket $ $
